title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 362.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 362.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to carry out the legislative
policy expressed in the New York State Environmental Quality Review Act of
maintaining a healthful environment for the people of the State of New York, preventing deterioration in the quality of the environment and of requiring
consideration of possible significant environmental consequences before action
is taken. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
362.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
